author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: نفس ینبغي أن یختار لنفسه ما لا یتصرّف فیه غیره ویکون معه في کلّ الأحوال تالله إنّه لحبّ الله لو أنتم من
translation: For every one of you his paramount duty is to choose for himself that on which no other may infringe and none usurp from him. Such a thing — and to this the Almighty is My witness — is the love of God, could ye but perceive it.
